#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
#define endll "\n";
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  int t,n;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--){
    cin>>n;
    string userid;
    char vote;
    map<string, char> mp;
    int result=0;
    while(n--){
      cin>>userid;
      cin>>vote;
      if(mp.find(userid)==mp.end()){

        // cout<<"current result: "<<result<<endll;
        // cout<<"user not found"<<endll;
        if(vote=='+'){
          // cout<<"vote is pos"<<endll;
          result++;
        }
        else{
          // cout<<"vote neg"<<endll;
          result--;

        }
        // cout<<"current result: "<<result<<endll;
        mp[userid]=vote;
      }
      else{
        // cout<<"current result: "<<result<<endll;
        // cout<<"user found"<<endll;
        if(mp[userid]=='+'){
          // cout<<"vote was pos"<<endll;
          result--;
        }
        else{
          // cout<<"vote was neg"<<endll;
          result++;
        }
        if(vote=='+'){
          // cout<<"vote is pos"<<endll;
          result++;
        }
        else{
          // cout<<"vote is neg"<<endll;
          result--;
        }
        mp[userid] = vote;
        // cout<<"current result: "<<result<<endll;

      }
    }
    cout<<result<<endl;
  }
	return 0;
}
